channel.title: Elizabeth's Sept 18 Blog
channel.description: Recent content on Elizabeth's Sept 18 Blog

item.title: New Post
item.description: This is a blog about data science. I will use R to show examples R Studio is easy to use, here are the packages you will need: dplyr Lahman The dplyr package is a grammar of data manipulation. Lahman provides stats from the history of professional baseball. Examples First we must load packages: library(Lahman) library(dplyr) Then we can explore the data: Batting%>% filter(HR>50)%>% select(playerID,HR) ## playerID HR ## 1 ruthba01 54 ## 2 ruthba01 59 ## 3 ruthba01 60 ## 4 ruthba01 54 ## 5 wilsoha01 56 ## 6 foxxji01 58 ## 7 greenha01 58 ## 8 kinerra01 51 ## 9 mizejo01 51 ## 10 kinerra01 54 ## 11 mayswi01 51 ## 12 mantlmi01 52 ## 13 mantlmi01 54 ## 14 marisro01 61 ## 15 mayswi01 52 ## 16 fostege01 52 ## 17 fieldce01 51 ## 18 mcgwima01 52 ## 19 griffke02 56 ## 20 griffke02 56 ## 21 mcgwima01 70 ## 22 sosasa01 66 ## 23 mcgwima01 65 ## 24 sosasa01 63 ## 25 bondsba01 73 ## 26 gonzalu01 57 ## 27 rodrial01 52 ## 28 sosasa01 64 ## 29 rodrial01 57 ## 30 thomeji01 52 ## 31 jonesan01 51 ## 32 howarry01 58 ## 33 ortizda01 54 ## 34 rodrial01 54 ## 35 bautijo02 54 ## 36 davisch02 53

item.title: Get in touch
item.description: When she reached the first hills of the Italic Mountains, she had a last view back on the skyline of her hometown Bookmarksgrove, the headline of Alphabet Village and the subline of her own road, the Line Lane. Pityful a rethoric question ran over her cheek, then Effects present letters inquiry no an removed or friends. Desire behind latter me though in. Supposing shameless am he engrossed up additions. My possible peculiar together to.
